text: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ قَالُواْ لَن تَمَسَّنَا ٱلنَّارُ إِلَّآ أَيَّامٗا مَّعۡدُودَٰتٖۖ وَغَرَّهُمۡ فِي دِينِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

translation.en: That is because they say, "Never will the Fire touch us except for [a few] numbered days," and [because] they were deluded in their religion by what they were inventing
translation.id: Hal itu adalah karena mereka berkata, "Api neraka tidak akan menyentuh kami kecuali beberapa hari saja." Mereka terpedaya dalam agama mereka oleh apa yang mereka ada-adakan
